attributes.action: Reinstate 93 feet east alcohol and entertainment license
attributes.additional_details: 93 feet east is an iconic venue which is a hub for creativity and cultural diversity. Over the years the venue have brought in music acts from all over the world, which has attracted a large number of people as well as generating a vast amount of exposure and revenue for the surrounding businesses. Nothing could ever take it's place.

rejection.details: A matter for the Local Authority.
